thread.title: A fantastic location and very friendly staff
thread.title_full: A fantastic location and very friendly staff - Review of The Court - A St Giles Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Lisa H
title: A fantastic location and very friendly staff
text:
We stayed for 2 nights and we would stay here again. The hotel rooms are a bit dated but they were big, clean and the location of this property is fabulous. You are a few minutes walk from Grand Central Station. There are shops and restaurants all around you and you are only 10-15 minutes from Times Square. We found this hotel to be very quiet even though there was a lively bar on the ground floor.
Room Tip: We were on the 10th floor with a great view of the Chrysler Building See more room tips
